thread.title: Andrew, Jenny and Henry
thread.title_full: www.arguscarhire.com reviewed by Andrew, Jenny and Henry

author: Andrew, Jenny and Henry
title: Andrew, Jenny and Henry
text:
All went smoothly but remember to look for EuropCar signs.
I did not appreciate having to pay 9 euros in advance for having the car cleaned. When you go skiing it is very difficult to keep the inside and out pristine. They said I would have to get it rinsed if the outside was dirty and this is impossible to prevent even though I always take good care of vehicles. I have never had this with any other company despite hiring several times every year. Moreover it was covered in a fine dust when I collected the car! They should include normal cleaning costs in the upfront rate for the car eg 4/5 euros for the carwash.
